T02D1550:197a-1: shr'i badzra yo gi n'i s'a dha nam /
T02D1550:197a-3: dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs //
T02D1550:197a-4: dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1550:197a-5: stong nyid snying rje'i bdag nyid can //
T02D1550:197a-6: khams gsum pa yi ngo bo nyid //
T02D1550:197a-9: bla ma brgyud pa'i rim pa ni //
T02D1550:197a-10: rtogs pa gcig gi spyod yul te //
T02D1550:197a-11: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs //
T02D1550:197a-12: mdor bsdus bdag gis bshad par bya //
T02D1550:197a-13: sngags pas thog mar re zhig bla ma dang sangs rgyas rnams la mngon par gus pa'i yid kyis //
T02D1550:197a-14: byang chub kyi sems brtan por bzung ste /
T02D1550:197a-15: dbang bskur ba yang dag par thob nas /
T02D1550:197a-16: chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin yin yang /
T02D1550:197b-0: rang dang gzhan gyi don phun sum @197b tshogs pa la mngon du phyogs par bya ste /
T02D1550:197b-1: dur khrod la sogs pa yid dang rjes su mthun
T02D1550:197b-2: pa'i dben pa'i gnas su stan 'jam po la rnal
T02D1550:197b-3: 'byor gyi rol pas rab tu bsngags pa'i gnas su
T02D1550:197b-5: de'i rjes la lus dang ngag dang sems yongs su dag par bya ba ni /
T02D1550:197b-6: rgun 'brum mam bu ram shing ngam /
T02D1550:197b-7: 'bras las byas pa'i btung ba bzang po ji ltar
T02D1550:197b-8: rnyed pa'i dam tshig lnga dang ldan par byas la
T02D1550:197b-9: mchod sbyin gyi snod du bzhag ste /
T02D1550:197b-10: yi ge gsum gyi sngags kyis mngon par bsngags nas /
T02D1550:197b-11: chu de nyid kyis lag pa g-yon pa nas brtsams
T02D1550:197b-12: nas yan lag dang nying lag thams cad sngags kyi
T02D1550:197b-14: de nyid kyis mchod pa'i rdzas kyang bsang gtor bya ba'o //
T02D1550:197b-16: aom bam hom yom hrim mom hrem hri h'um h'um phat phat /
T02D1550:197b-17: ces bya ba'i sngags kyi yi ges lag pa g-yon pa'i sor mo rnams la sbyar te /
T02D1550:197b-18: dag pa gsum brjod par bya'o //
T02D1550:197b-19: aom sva bh'a ba shuddha: sarbba dharm'a: sva bh'a ba shuddho& ham /
T02D1550:197b-20: aom badzra shuddha: sarba dharm'a badzra shuddho& ham//
T02D1550:197b-21: aom yo ga shuddha: sarba dharm'a yo ga shuddho& ham /
T02D1550:197b-22: de nas rang gi lus khams gsum po rnam par dag pa'i gzhal yas khang du brtags te /
T02D1550:197b-23: skad cig tsam gyis lte ba'i skyil 'khor du rdo
T02D1550:197b-24: rje rnal 'byor ma phyag gnyis na gri gug dang
T02D1550:197b-26: skra grol ba thur du 'phyang ba /
T02D1550:197b-28: gzugs dang lang tsho phun sum tshogs pa /
T02D1550:197b-29: phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan //
T02D1550:197b-30: sangs rgyas lnga yi dbu rgyan can //
T02D1550:197b-31: zla ba nyi ma me dkyil du //
T02D1550:197b-32: skyil krung phyed pas gnon mdzad cing //
T02D1550:197b-33: dza ba sindhu ra dang mtshungs //
T02D1550:197b-34: de lta'i gzugs can lha mo ni //
T02D1550:197b-35: rnal 'byor pa yis rtag tu bsgom //
T02D1550:197b-36: de yi g-yas ni phag gdong ste //
T02D1550:197b-37: de bzhin g-yon pa khro mo nyid //
T02D1550:197b-38: kun rdzob don dam rang bzhin gyis //
T02D1550:197b-39: zhal gnyis su ni rab tu grags //
T02D1550:197b-40: bla ma'i man ngag lam gyis ni //
T02D1550:197b-41: rim pa rgyas par rtogs par bya //
T02D1550:197b-42: de yi padma'i nang du ni //
T02D1550:197b-43: don kun sgrub byed 'khor lo bsgom //
T02D1550:197b-44: rim pa gsum gyis mtshan nas su //
T02D1550:197b-45: kha dog dmar po'i 'od zer can //
T02D1550:197b-46: sngags kyi yi ges yongs rdzogs nas //
T02D1550:197b-48: srin po'i zhal ni cung zhig bsdam //
T02D1550:197b-49: rab tu 'bar ba'i rnam par bsgom //
T02D1550:198a-3: phyag rgya gnyis po'i rnal 'byor gyis //
T02D1550:198a-5: rnal 'byor bdag nyid skad cig gis //
T02D1550:198a-7: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
T02D1550:198a-8: sngags btu ba yi cho ga mchog / gru gsum dkyil 'khor nyams dga' ba //
T02D1550:198a-9: rdo rje rol pa las byung ba'i //
T02D1550:198a-10: chos kyi 'byung gnas zhes bshad pa //
T02D1550:198a-11: btsun mo'i bha ga nyid kyang de //
T02D1550:198a-12: a'a lo k'a li'i dbye bas der //
T02D1550:198a-13: sde tshan brgyad kyi rim pa ni //
T02D1550:198a-14: gzugs me mda' dang thub pa dang //
T02D1550:198a-15: bu ga drag po 'dod pa nyid //
T02D1550:198a-16: 'khor lo rnams ni rim bzhin du //
T02D1550:198a-17: man ngag gis ni dgod par bya //
T02D1550:198a-18: dang por aa nas brtsams nas su //
T02D1550:198a-19: yi ge ha yi mthar thug par //
T02D1550:198a-20: bskor ba'i tshul gyi sbyor ba yis //
T02D1550:198a-21: bde mchog rgya mtsho gsung bzhin bri //
T02D1550:198a-22: dva yi thog ma sum 'gyur bya //
T02D1550:198a-23: thig le n'a ngas rnam par brgyan //
T02D1550:198a-24: bha thog tsha thog yi ge nyid //
T02D1550:198a-25: ta yig thog mas mgo bor brgyan //
T02D1550:198a-26: tsa sa'i bar nas gzung byas te //
T02D1550:198a-28: sha thog sha thog 'brel ba ni //
T02D1550:198a-29: de bzhin sbyor bar shes par bya //
T02D1550:198a-30: li yi mgo gyur yi ge la //
T02D1550:198a-31: nya yi 'og nas gnas pas brgyan //
T02D1550:198a-32: pa thog ta yig 'og mar ldan //
T02D1550:198a-33: pha thog tha yig 'og mas bcings //
T02D1550:198a-34: ha ta'i bar gnas yi ge la //
T02D1550:198a-35: na yig thog na gnas pas brgyan //
T02D1550:198a-36: sha yi 'og na gnas pas gzung //
T02D1550:198a-38: ha yi steng gnas yi ge nyid //
T02D1550:198a-39: ra yig gong ma nyis brtsegs ldan //
T02D1550:198a-40: ta yig gong ma sbyar bya ste //
T02D1550:198a-41: mgo bo ru ni yongs su grags //
T02D1550:198a-42: pha yi thog na gnas pa la //
T02D1550:198a-43: tha yig thog na gnas pas brgyan //
T02D1550:198a-44: nya thog na thog gis brgyan pa //
T02D1550:198a-45: man ngag bzhin du shes par bya //
T02D1550:198a-46: tsa sa'i bar na gnas pa blang //
T02D1550:198a-48: de bzhin tsha yi gong ma zung //
T02D1550:198a-49: de bzhin ta yi steng mas brgyan //
T02D1550:198a-50: tha yi steng mas na 'og brgyan //
T02D1550:198a-51: pha yi 'og gnas yi ge blang //
T02D1550:198a-52: dha ba bar gnas yi ge blang //
T02D1550:198a-53: tha yi 'og mas brgyan pha nyid //
T02D1550:198a-54: yi ge nya la'i bar gnas pa //
T02D1550:198a-55: na yi gong mas brgyan par bya //
T02D1550:198a-56: sa'i bar gnas yi ge la /
T02D1550:198a-57: r'i yi 'og ma gdangs par bya //
T02D1550:198a-58: thig le n'a da mnyam ldan pa //
T02D1550:198b-0: gsum @198b 'gyur du ni dbye ba nyid //
T02D1550:198b-2: snga ma bzhin du sum 'gyur bya //
T02D1550:198b-3: sha 'og sha yi mgo mas brgyan //
T02D1550:198b-4: nya yi 'og na gnas pa sbyar //
T02D1550:198b-5: ma wa bar na gnas pa gzung //
T02D1550:198b-6: dzha yig gdong mas rnam par brgyan //
T02D1550:198b-7: bla ma'i man ngag lam gyis ni //
T02D1550:198b-8: sngags btu ba ni shes par bya //
T02D1550:198b-9: glegs bam klog pa'i sngags pa yis //
T02D1550:198b-10: ji lta'i rim pa spangs pa yis //
T02D1550:198b-11: gang des bskal ba bye bar byas //
T02D1550:198b-12: dngos grub go 'phang mi thob pa //
T02D1550:198b-13: gzhan yang rab tu bshad bya ba //
T02D1550:198b-14: rdo rje can gyi mchod pa ni //
T02D1550:198b-15: tshes bcu'i dus su khyad par du //
T02D1550:198b-16: mchod pa lnga dang ldan gyur cing //
T02D1550:198b-17: bza' ston de bzhin btung ba dang //
T02D1550:198b-18: phyi dang gsang bar bcas par ldan //
T02D1550:198b-19: snod ni dri med sbyangs pa ru //
T02D1550:198b-20: gur kum la sogs sbyar bar bya //
T02D1550:198b-21: chu bzang po dang ldan pa la //
T02D1550:198b-23: gser gyi smyu gu'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D1550:198b-24: blo dang ldan pas ae dbyibs bris //
T02D1550:198b-25: dbus su sngags kyi rgyal po ni //
T02D1550:198b-26: rim pa bzhin du bri bar bya //
T02D1550:198b-27: g-yung drung 'khyil ba'i phyag rgya ni //
T02D1550:198b-28: dge ba'i 'khor lo'i logs la dgod //
T02D1550:198b-29: me tog rnam pa sna tshogs nyid //
T02D1550:198b-30: chu las skyes dang thang las skyes //
T02D1550:198b-31: mar me ts'a ru dam tshig che //
T02D1550:198b-32: de bzhin gzhon nu ma yang mchod //
T02D1550:198b-33: mchod pa'i khyad par 'di dag ni //
T02D1550:198b-34: nges pa nyid du bya ba yin //
T02D1550:198b-35: skra grol gcer bur byas nas ni //
T02D1550:198b-36: sdar bshad phyogs bcu bltas nas kyang //
T02D1550:198b-37: shin tu gsang bar bya ba nyid //
T02D1550:198b-38: mchod pa'i dus su mnyam par gzhag //
T02D1550:198b-39: ma gsang bgegs ni skye 'gyur te //
T02D1550:198b-40: dngos grub de bzhin nyams par 'gyur //
T02D1550:198b-41: dam tshig nyams par gyur pa na //
T02D1550:198b-43: srog ni gtong bar gyur pa yis //
T02D1550:198b-44: 'chi ba'i dus la bab kyang bla'i //
T02D1550:198b-45: gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na //
T02D1550:198b-46: dam tshig rtag tu bsrung bar bya //
T02D1550:198b-47: khams gsum brtan dang g-yo ba yis //
T02D1550:198b-49: g-yon pa sngon du bskyod bya ste ;
T02D1550:198b-50: / rnal 'byor rtag tu g-yon pas spyad //
T02D1550:198b-51: mchod pa lag pa g-yon pas ta //
T02D1550:198b-52: bza' btung g-yon pas bya ba nyid //
T02D1550:198b-53: rigs lnga la ni kun spyod pa //
T02D1550:198b-54: rigs gcig tu ni brtag par bya //
T02D1550:198b-55: bza' dang bza' min de bzhin btung //
T02D1550:198b-56: sme gtsang ngo tsha rnam par spangs //
T02D1550:199a-0: rtog pa kun las nges par @199a * //
T02D1550:199a-2: / rtsod pa thams cad rnam par spangs //
T02D1550:199a-3: mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom //
T02D1550:199a-4: dpa' bo seng ge bzhin du spyod //
T02D1550:199a-5: sngags ni rnal 'byor ma'i rang bzhin //
T02D1550:199a-6: rnal 'byor ma ni sngags kyi gzugs //
T02D1550:199a-8: de dag tha dad par mi bya //
T02D1550:199a-9: mi yis gang dang gang bsgom pa //
T02D1550:199a-10: yid dang yang dag ldan byas nas //
T02D1550:199a-11: des na de yi bdag nyid 'gyur //
T02D1550:199a-12: sna tshogs nor bu ji bzhin no //
T02D1550:199a-13: sems dang rjes mthun rnal 'byor gyis //
T02D1550:199a-14: gang zhig shin tu goms byed na //
T02D1550:199a-15: mi gang bsod nams dman pa yang //
T02D1550:199a-16: de ni grub 'gyur the tshom med //
T02D1550:199a-17: bla ma sangs rgyas bla ma chos //
T02D1550:199a-18: de bzhin bal ma dge 'dun te //
T02D1550:199a-19: bla ma dpal ldan rdo rje can //
T02D1550:199a-20: 'dir ni bla ma bla med pa'o //
T02D1550:199a-22: de phyir bla ma bsnyen bkur bya //
T02D1550:199a-23: dpal dang ldan pa'i rub tu sngags pa'i gnas au
T02D1550:199a-24: rgyan nas byung ba'i dgongs pa bla na med pa
T02D1550:199a-25: dpa' rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i gsang chen rna ba
T02D1550:199a-26: nas rna ba ru zhal nas zhal du brgyud pa'i
T02D1550:199a-29: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po bsod nams 'byung gnas bzang po'i zhal snga nas dang /
